description:
This course is about how to search, install and delete WordPress plugins. WordPress plugins are additional small programs that you can add to your WordPress site to make your website better. Think of your WordPress website as your house that has value and in order to increase the value is to increase your exposure online. WordPress plugins are the additional accessories that you add to your house to make your home better. Think of WordPress plugins as a nice Kohler sink or a marble island.

We will cover the best plugins that I use on a regular basis and more as the course progresses.

We look forward to meeting you in class.

Angela Samuels
title: WordPress Plugin Tutorial
